data_sources.description: Dataset containing Irish whiskey sales with columns such as year, country, and cases.

data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: DataFrame containing Irish whiskey sales data.

data_variables.name: year
data_variables.description: Column representing the year of sales.

data_variables.name: cases
data_variables.description: Column representing the number of cases sold.

data_variables.name: country
data_variables.description: Column representing the country of origin.

data_variables.name: quality
data_variables.description: Column representing the quality of the whiskey.

data_flow.flow: Used for plotting and analysis of Irish whiskey sales.
Used in grouping and plotting yearly sales data.
Used as a target variable in line plots to visualize whiskey sales over the years.
Used for analyzing whiskey sales by country and visualization in bar charts.
Used for visualizing the distribution of whiskey quality.
